name: strip
readme:
## strip [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/dylanpiercey/strip.png)](https://travis-ci.org/dylanpiercey/strip) Strips HTML tags. ### Install ```bash $ npm install strip ``` ### Usage ```js strip('

Hello World

'); // => Hello World ``` ![](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/9q2p5mrqnajys22/npmel.jpg?token_hash=AAHqttN9DiGl63ma8KRw-G0cdalaiMzrvrOPGnOfDslDjw)
